Reviews.Content: This camera supposedly compensates for the hand shake using its moving lenses. But a lot of pictures end up shaky. The colors are vivid and lively in the pictures. Hold the camera very still and the pictures will turn out be really good

Reviews.Title: didn't last long
Reviews.Author: History Buff "cp5249"
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera in November, 2011 and it died a couple of weeks ago. It won't focus and I got a "lens error" message eventually. I went online and found that a lot of people had this same issue.It took very good pictures and decent video while it lasted but I'm not going to spend as much on a new camera and will definitely not get a Nikon. It's a shame as they used to be the best name in cameras.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Seth J Reuter
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera before going on vacation and practiced with it for about a week.  Went on vacation and found that the battery failed after only half a day of picture-taking.  Ended up using iPhone camera as backup but wanted stand alone camera for higher MP quality photos for printing later. Unable to return for refund so I kept the camera and thought the problem was the overseas adaptor so continued to use in the states. Found that using it for videos drained battery instantly.  Photos only didnt drain as quickly.  Contacted Nikon and they won't stand behind it at all.  My negligence in not returning to camera immediately.  Would not buy another Nikon point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rena K. Dill
Reviews.Content: Love the camera!  A little trouble with the focus at first, but its working great now.  Really takes great pictures!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: PCB,FL
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 3 years now. It takes beautiful pictures, the zoom is extremely good for a P&S;, and this camera has held up so well. It has been all over the country with me, and has worked beautifully for any occassion. (Grand Canyon, Las Vegas lights, Professional baseball game lights, Orlando theme parks, the beach, when I say everywhere, this camera has been all over with me). I do keep it in a hard shell case in my purse, and I carry it every day since photography is my hobby. This camera hasn't failed me in any way. I would not recommend it for complete beginners, as it has many features that are customizable, and a beginner might not know what to do with them all. But then again, it has an Auto setting, so it could just be set on Auto and they could use it that way any time. The touch screen is one of the best things about this camera. Very convenient and easy to use. There are so many settings, like sunset, fireworks, etc., it would be hard not to find a setting that fits your needs.

Reviews.Title: Its not a bad product.
Reviews.Author: Happy Shopper
Reviews.Content: This is a good product but it takes approx. four seconds for it to take the photo once you hit the shutter button.

Reviews.Title: Simple Excellence!
Reviews.Author: Robert Leahy
Reviews.Content: This is even better than the slightly older version I have. The pictures are fantastically clear and I really like the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, will buy again. this is my 2nd & will continue to buy on my next
Reviews.Author: RICHARD
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, will buy again. this is my 2nd & will continue to buy on my next. Does my novice photo needs

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Brittney N. Clark
Reviews.Content: To start off I'm not really tech savvy, I just wanted a nice point and shoot camera for under $200. I thought I had found that in the Nikon S6100. I have had this camera for almost 2 solid years and at first it lived up to the Nikon name: took crisp photos, touch screen was always responsive, not bulky etc... fastforward to last week. I had a friend who was getting married and I wanted to photograph the happy occasion. I plug in my camera to charge and nothing. The charging light does not even activate. I thought it may have been that particular outlet so I tried every outlet in my bedroom (4 seperate outlets, still nothing. I tried to power on the camera...nothing! The camera was not dead prior, but now it would not even turn on! So I googled this problem only to find out that others have experienced this very problem with the Coolpix S6100. I'm so disgusted. I would think to spend $180.00 on a camera it would last longer than 2 years...Don't even waste your money. I may have better luck with a Canon.

Reviews.Title: loooooooooooow battery life
Reviews.Author: ArtGal
Reviews.Content: and room for 3 photos .. so DONT FORGET TO PUT A MEM CARD IN!It is a nice size & looks cool, but id rather use my phone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Avidbuyer
Reviews.Content: Lightweight with a lot of options. I like it. I just wish it came with a book of instructions instead of just a cd.

Reviews.Title: Good and Simple to use camera
Reviews.Author: Yancy Smith "-Yancy-"
Reviews.Content: I love Nikon cameras but for all the new technology out this camera is kinda sluggish when it comes to taking the picture and writing it to the SD card.  The screen on the back requires you to use the stylus that comes on the strap or the tip of your finger.  So don't think it will work like your Android touch screen phone.  It does come with a rechargeable battery and charger that holds up pretty good.  The charger will work with other Nikon cameras so if you happen to have more than one Nikon like I do it can charge all of them.  The menus are pretty easy to navigate and figure out.  Takes good video and the display on the back is pretty clear especially being a big screen for such a small camera. Its best when used outdoors and in well lit areas.  Even the different scene settings have trouble indoors with lower light.  Everything must be absolutely still to prevent pictures from coming out blurry.I like it but I'm an advanced user so this camera feels like it holds me back some when I am at an event and I'm stuck waiting for it to let me take the next picture when I only have 1 opportunity to get a good shot.For $100 I feel I got an ok camera but not a great one.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Syl Flower "Shopper Shark"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I couldn't find my other Nikon camera.  It works great.  I also found my other one and tookthem both on vacation to Florida.  I like the touch screen on this new one.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these. For this price, I was a great deal. Great photos. Gave as gifts both of them. Now I am really thought highly of, that I would be so considerate to give such a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Patrick J. McInerney
Reviews.Content: The camera was good.But it has been replaced by the camera on the iPhone.Why carry an extra camera when you have one build into a smart phone.Obviously, I'm not a professional photographer.joe

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: Nice camera overall. It's decent and although it's HD, when you record from afar it gets blurring sometimes.Not the best but for filming upclose, it's nice. The pictures depends on which settings you put it to.It gets annoying to adjust it constantly because sometimes it's too bright or too dark but you'll figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Many options on the Market
Reviews.Author: leandro oliveira
Reviews.Content: Brazil - Gramado - Rio Grande do SulI bought this camera to a friendsimple camera for day to day, there are many options on the market, I do not recommend

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot with some fantastic color enhancement features
Reviews.Author: Canyon "'80's Man"
Reviews.Content: This camera has some great features, especially for taking scenic shots. You can adjust color saturation on the camera to take some amazing scenic shots of sunsets, landscapes, and water. The touch screen is easy to use but in some cases is too easy as a double tap causes the camera to actually take a picture. If you are fumbling around with in your bag or pocket to get the camera and it is on then it may take a picture unintentially. It also seems to randomly take a very long time (up to 15 seconds) to record the picture on the SD card. It has a descent zoom and pretty good wide angel for scenic shots. The video is also quite good. The 16 MP resolution makes for some very crisp and vibrant pictures. Not very good for fast or rapid shooting.

Reviews.Title: Beatiful
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Pretty cam, color so beautiful, the quality of image it's perfect, all the function working justfine, the flash it's really agressive but work, really great zoom, It offers the quality of a great camera in a small format.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Davigirl "Never Trouble Trouble Till Trouble ...
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our 5yr old and he loves it... The touch screen is awesome for him. Plus it was right before Christmas and it delivered before Christmas

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S6100 Camera
Reviews.Author: Rita A. Huebner
Reviews.Content: This was for my dad, and he likes it.  Hasn't had much time to use it, but he seem happy.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: dsvaep
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, but resolution was not what I expected.  Videos are not very long. Would not recommend purchasing if you are looking for high quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S6100  Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Smokey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use camera ,takes great pictures,small enough to fit anywhere ,wife is a little rough with cameras .She loves this one and keeps it in her pocketbook most of the time ready to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Terry M
Reviews.Content: Long battery life, excellent lens & mirrors, all produce quality pictures. Nikon has a perfect camera in this little point-and-shoot. If you're looking for a small, tag-a-long camera for quick spur of the moment shots, this is it!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Beverly
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera so much that I bought this one for my sister for Christmas.  It is just the best camera ever.

Reviews.Title: All around a good bargain
Reviews.Author: NathanJP
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a great camera. It is of high quality, takes good photos and is reasonably priced. The 7x zoom comes in handy, though I have to put it on sport mode to counter act my shaky hands. The downside is I thought the pictures would be a little better coming from Nikon. I think my old 3MP Kodak I bought at Walmart looked at least as good.Higher end point and shoot cameras offer features such as 1080p video recording (this one is 720p), panorama mode and higher zoom levels. If these are important features to you, then I recommend that you buy a different camera. If not, this is a solid purchase.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Sonya
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my 15 year old she loves taking pictures, So far she loves this with the touch screen ect.

Reviews.Title: Lens doesn't open all the way so pictures have a black blob in them
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera and sent it back to the manufacturer to have it fixed or replaced.  We had used it at the beach and thought sand got stuck in it causing the lens to not fully open.  We sent it back, got it replaced for free and now a few months later, the same thing is happening again and we have not been to the beach!  Frustrating.  We will be shopping for a new camera.

Reviews.Title: Touchscreen is a pain
Reviews.Author: Maggie0125
Reviews.Content: The touchscreen and the tool are a pain to use.  I own other touchscreen devices and I don't like this feature on a camera.  I wish I would have gotten the standard camera without the touchscreen feature.Otherwise, it's a great camera and takes excellent pictures.  I'm an avid fan of Nikon, but not the touchscreen.

Reviews.Title: Review of Coolpix S6100 Camera
Reviews.Author: nsalin
Reviews.Content: I rate it tops, it works well as a modern camera.  Does more than I expected.  And it performs faster and better than my cell phone camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX
Reviews.Author: Louis
Reviews.Content: Great camera; easy to use & upload photos to my computer. Received my order on time & in good condition. Very satisfied with the vendor & the quality of their service.

Reviews.Title: Camera stopped working
Reviews.Author: prakash batra
Reviews.Content: Camera has stopped working after 1 year and i hardly used it. As per Nikon store, they are charging too much to replace the part.

Reviews.Title: once you get familiar, it's a great camera.
Reviews.Author: PhilSam
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift from my niece for my bday and I love this little camera. I've been using a Kodak 3.1 mpix from 1999 that still will take really crisp, beautiful pictures but, tiny screen and drills batteries. The Nikon screen is easy to see and use. I'm not struggling like other reviewers yet. Most complaints seem to be operator's errors and malfunctions. It does what you tell it to so, learn your way around it before you go to that party or whatever you don't want to miss shots and memories. Practice makes perfect and this is not hard to figure out. The video camera is the most stable and HD res that I have ever had in my hands. Testing around, I took some video of the pets and house. I played it back on HD TV and WOW!! This S6100 is only 720p compared to Nikon S8100 and higher that does 1080p but, I don't mind. Like I said, this is the best res I have owned yet and it is still nothing to frown on. I like pictures but, I'm no photographer. I will be taking a lot more videos and pictures now. The effects are fun too. If you want you phone to be a camera, go for it. If you want a camera for a camera, you might want to really consider this one. 16 mpix is how you say,.. very nice...Recommend using stylus. It's just easier and more precise than your finger. I can't knit pick at this with my experience. Others can but, I'm not. Very happy with the new addition.

Reviews.Title: Broken after only 6 months
Reviews.Author: llalib "laura"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for office use - very light use and broke within 6 months for no reason - It just won't turn on.  it was a great little camera while it was working, but $150 down the drain...  I normally love Nikon products but this one was a lemon.

Reviews.Title: Nikons for ever
Reviews.Author: James B. Hendricks, Jr.
Reviews.Content: This is my sixth Nikon in the last forty years. I just love this camera. The touch screen to view the pictures I'd great.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Diane Paul
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for his birthday. It is so easy to use, even he has NO trouble working it! Takes wonderful pictures and has a great zoom. Most definetely I would recommend this to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Super Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: stevet529
Reviews.Content: The Nikon S6100 replaces a Nikon S4000 (2 yrs. old) that I damaged myself thru carelessness.New camera outperforms in many ways: easier set-up, more zoom ability, less screen clutter,and its' not cranky when I set it for Movies like the older camera. And it cost the same asthe old one. What a deal!

Reviews.Title: Repaired twice.  Broke again.  Doorstop now.
Reviews.Author: jlgunnell
Reviews.Content: This would be a good point and shoot if the lens cover and zoom mechanism weren't so fragile.  It was easy to use, had a lot of features, and took good pictures when it worked. Unfortunately we went through three S6100s through initial purchase and replacement and none of them lasted an entire year without a problem.Our first lens cover issue happened two weeks after we purchased.  The original retailer swapped the camera for us.The second time it happened the camera was still under the year warranty and Nikon sent us a new one(after a month long wait for parts that never came to fix the camera we sent in).Finally, just past the 6 month warranty period on the "repair" which was actually a replacement, we had another error.  This time with the lens itself, not the cover.  Nikon wanted $120 to fix the problem.  Since the listed price on Amazon as I write this review is $109.00 I obviously won't be doing that.We used the S6100 like you would expect to use any point and shoot.  It lived in my wife's purse or my backpack. We never dropped or abused it.  Apparently it needs to be treated with kid gloves or live in a clean room to keep working. The only comparison I can make from personal experience is a trusty Canon Elph that isn't near the picture quality but has been going strong for 5 years without an issue.  In fact, we gave it to our young children to use and it's withstood all the abuse they can dish out.I won't be buying another Nikon.  The fragile engineering on this camera and painful support experiences have soured me on them completely.

Reviews.Title: Lens cover won't open after very little use
Reviews.Author: B. A. Richardson
Reviews.Content: I got this to replace a kodak easy share that I'd had for several years.  It did take better pictures than the kodak did, but after very little use the lens cover quit opening all the way.  I could not even manually force the lens cover off about a quarter of the lens so it bacame useless.  I bought it after booking a trip to disneyland in January and had stopped using it by March because of this.  I had of course tossed all packaging and receipts so it was a complete waste of money... it didn't even make it to our trip and now I am shopping for another and have no idea what to settle on.

Reviews.Title: nice Camera
Reviews.Author: RB
Reviews.Content: the images are very clear and with an awesome resolution. The videos are also very good, with good resolution and sound

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: Trunnto
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for a relative based on past experiences with a previous model CoolPix. The recipient of the camera enjoys the touch-panel as it is responsive and not too sensitive. In short, I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a simple point and shoot with little hassle.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use Camara
Reviews.Author: Dar
Reviews.Content: This camara is amazing.  The pictures come out great and having the ability to move from one picture to another by either touching the screen or using the stylis is so nice.  You can crop the pictures after you have taken them, the videos are great.  I would recommend this camara to anyone, in fact I have a couple of people that will be purchsing one on Amazon.com.  Transferring pictures to computer is also very easy.  I am not the most technical person, but was able to figure this out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent point & shoot from Nikon
Reviews.Author: Raymond C. Cauchon "KusH"
Reviews.Content: What would you expect? Nikon makes a quality camera for decades.It does exactly what I ask of it.It is the best for the price available.I gave taken about 300 flawless photos with it and it works great.I have 4 cams and this one is one of the best for the cash spent.Thank you Nikon & Amazon for the best price on the internet.I bought another for a friend and it is also excellent!

Reviews.Title: Missing items
Reviews.Author: mol
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera because I had one just like it.  Unfortunately, the seller did not include a memory card with the camera.  Also, the original case for the camera was not included.  A few extra items were added and I'm assuming that was to make up for the missing items.  I wish the camera was listed as missing a memory card and that a different case was included.  Seems a bit like false advertising to me.  I'm charging the camera right now so I haven't used it yet but am assuming it will be as good as the other one I purchased.

Reviews.Title: fully stands to expectations
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: High quality of optics and other components cause high quality end product.Never had any trouble with this camera whatsoever. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S6100 16 MP Digital Camera with 7x NIKKOR Wide-Angle...
Reviews.Author: BAYA-----VZLA "yoslenb"
Reviews.Content: excelente producto lo recomiendo ha funcionado de maravilla lo compre desde venezuela y llego en perfecto estado excelente vendedor toda la compra y el envio fue muy rapido

Reviews.Title: My new Nikon
Reviews.Author: Nicholas C.
Reviews.Content: I got my package in the mail and it seemed like it was fro Nikon directly! It came with everything, even the warranty! I haven't used in depth but everything seems great! I got it for new at 119.00 so watch out he goes low with prices sometimes. It can save you a few bucks for sure!

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: MoonGun67
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased to provide a novice photographer with the means to record images from an overseas trip.  It has functioned well in that capacity.  The settings to adjust for backlighting or to manage night scenes were challenging to find, but most of what was needed, the user was able to do.  Compact and functional, at a good price--not bad, not bad at all.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: At Chetkins
Reviews.Content: This unit takes great pix and movies with no problems.  All this and you can easily carry in your pocket!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and takes quality pics.
Reviews.Author: pearlolive
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera from Amazon at a great price after my older model gave out.  This one is also very easy to use, and the picture quality is great.  I love the larger screen and easy ability to catagorize and replay images.

Reviews.Title: THe camera
Reviews.Author: glamorpuss "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: I am still learning the features of this camera.The booklet did not give adequate info so I still have to download the CD to see if it would help.If anyone out there can assist me in using it productively I would appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera !!
Reviews.Author: Amber Varga "amber"
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera from best buy in january (2012) and so far it seems to be a great little camera. I bought this to have along side my Kodak camera that i have, and that camera is a bulky (its got big zoom) and sometimes i dont like to carry that in my purse 24/7 for that reason,i also didnt want to loose so much zoom like other small cameras.. So i needed something small and had some good zoom that i could stick in my purse and leave there for use when needed. this camera is perfect for that. i purchase a hard shell camera case for it so it wont get ruined in my purse. As for the camera, it seems to be really nice (i havnt had it long) its got 16 megapixels, 7x zoom (great for a little camera), touch screen, and some extra features. It also allows you to draw on your pictures with the in camera writing tool, which is pretty cool.the only cons that i have about this camera is that it does take a little long for the camera to come off of just taking a picture. the load time is a few seconds..i wish it could be a little faster, i did turn of the picture playback that all cameras have where you can see the picture for a second after you take it, i turned that off so it helped a little, but not to much. its is also a little slow when you push the "playback" button to review your pictures, and i found nothing that can help with that, just have a little patience i guess. this reason is the only one i have for giving it a 4 star review, if thy had 4 and a half stars i would give it that because its not to to big a deal.All in all, it is a nice camera and the pictures look real good. im a camera junkie as i have had all different type of cameras, so a camera that takes nice photos is pretty important to me. i would recommend this camera to anyone who wants this to be an ad on camera, something that you can throw in your pocket or purse and just leave it there.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: CJP
Reviews.Content: I'm an amateur photographer, got this camera for times where its to difficult to carry around a bigger one. I've had this camera for a few months now and love it.  For a point and click it takes awesome pictures.  Took it on a vacation to Mexico and was very happy I had it with me!  It has more setting you change that the usual point and click.  The videos not bad, but if that's what you're looking for I'd pick something else.  Don't get me wrong, its not bad.  It can just take a minute to focus if you try to change the zoom while recording.Update:  I've now had this camera for over two years and I still love it! This is great when my D5200 is to big or to fragile to take with me. Takes excellent pictures for a point and click! The touch screen can take a minute to get use to, but once you do its really nice to have. I really like all the different scene selection options (20 in total). This is a great little camera for hiking and vacations.

Reviews.Title: great shot
Reviews.Author: Valarie Pagni "silkworm"
Reviews.Content: This was bought as a birthday present. He took it out of the box, charges from the wall. No batteries. He started shooting pics right away. He loves the ease of it. It takes great pictures, easy to edit. I would buy this again in a heart beat.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal !
Reviews.Author: 57Texas
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get a camera last year but the prices were too high.  This camera is not only affordable but has features that higher priced cameras do not have. I did some research before buying it and found the reviews rated this S6100 better than the S8100.  The zoom lense on this camera is extra sharp and the features are so easy to use. I got this camera for my daughter for Christmas and her boyfriend also received a much higher priced camera. He loved this one though and said to my daughter, "you always get the good stuff"!  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: For the price, you can't beat this camera.  It does everything you'd want it to and the functions are easily accessible and easy to use.The picture quality could be a little better but then the price would be a lot higher too.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Antonio A Perez
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for a trip it took great pics. Took me abit to learn how to use mostly with out the manual its fairly user friendly and as far as speed I purchased Hi speed memory and it was very good. Battery life was good though I did get an extra battery which came in handy. I recomended this to my daughter as she is looking at Nikons and I'll recomend it to others too!!!

Reviews.Title: Gil's Review
Reviews.Author: gsnbowie
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly as described by Amazon.  I haven't used all of the features yet and may never use all of them - there are so many.  For the money, I don't think one can find a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David in Jax
Reviews.Content: Great camera that is easy to use and takes excellent pictures.  However, free advertised 4GB memory card was not included in package and has yet to arrive.

Reviews.Title: everything ok
Reviews.Author: edgardo machado
Reviews.Content: the product is of excellent quality images taken with the camera are of the quality expected and has 16 mp touch screen as we wanted to thank you very much very good product

Reviews.Title: Point and shoot enjoyment
Reviews.Author: GC Wood "Gary Wood"
Reviews.Content: Our brother had this camera when he came for a visit.  There were many things he liked about is so after looking at the other comparable cameras in this category we decided to buy it.  It is smaller than our Panasonic bridge camera which makes it more convenient for much of our daily picture taking yet we will keep the Panasonic as there are many things it will do this one will not.Picture quality is pretty good from what I can tell.  The photos inside without the flash were better than the ones using the flash in an office setting.  I used it during our office party and it captured good photos even when people are moving.  It will automatically focus in on faces and there has been no red eye challenges, etc.  We have not used the movie mode yet so I canont say how the quality is for that.You cannot ask for a much easier setup and the menuing system is easy to follow.  Use the stylus that comes with it, just hook it on the strap and it will be much easier than using your fingers.  Overall it has nice settings and options.  One real feature it is missing is the number of pictures left based on the card size.  You can get estimates from the web yet I expected it to be on the camera like most of the others.  It is a small thing yet the small things are important sometimes.Overall we will enjoy this camera for much of what we want to capture.  It has a really solid feel compared to some of the others I have looked at.  This is the first Nikon I have had and for the category I believe it was a good purchase at a good price.  It was on sale and I added it to the cart and then went to view some other cameras just to make sure it was the one I wanted.  While shopping the price dropped another $5 and that was a nice surprise.

Reviews.Title: Worth the $
Reviews.Author: Melissa Hensley
Reviews.Content: I don't spend a lot on electronics, but this camera is great!!  Small, affordable and takes great pics!  It has lots of great features, too.  I recommend it

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: SMC
Reviews.Content: Takes nice pictures, but does take some time getting used to using the stylus and menu choices.  My other cameras were simpler, but I think I will love this one once I get the hang of the stylus. Otherwise, a good purchase for me.

Reviews.Title: I got best deal
Reviews.Author: ad19428
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this product at less price than the posted one. Really a good camera with so good features, handy. Even at highest zoom level picture quality is very good. I will definitely recommend this to my friends & family.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!
Reviews.Author: EiNST3iN
Reviews.Content: Pros: I was amazed at the number of features this camera has. I'm not a computer wiz and the manual (both on paper and on a CD) helped immensely. It probably does more than I'll ever need, but who's complaining? It has proven to be extremely durable as well! Pictures are so clear and this model has the new focus feature that makes life so much better when using this camera!Cons: None that I can see.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix s6100
Reviews.Author: hakki
Reviews.Content: Perfecrt pictures both inside and outside. I absolutely recommend it..It is easy to carry. The touch panel screen is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Okay for snapshots and some landscapes
Reviews.Author: Inspiringshots
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon D90 and just thought I'd carry this Coolpix camera in my purse.  Love the touch screen and options (borders - writing on photos).  I have yet to get a good macro photo - they usually come out blurry - in all fairness I will watch the CD that came with the camera regarding macros and see it there is anything I am doing wrong here. The landscape shots are nice but definitely lose focus in the distance and are a bit noisy. If you have a program to refocus and reduce noise you can still produce a nice landscape.  Great for candid photos of people.  Battery seems to last longer then I expected.  For the price this is an acceptable camera.

Reviews.Title: Can you believe it? This came with free shipping!
Reviews.Author: rkling2
Reviews.Content: I'm amazed that so much can be done with this small camera. I have a Canon PowerShot S31S, but it's to big for me to carry around. It semms this little Nikon COOLPIX S6100 does everything I did with my bigger cameras. A great price and fast service. Very happy with my experience.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Expected
Reviews.Author: A. HALE
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon S6100 as I have recently had to give up hockey as a hobby which I was very passionate about and photography was supposed to fill the void. I was very excited when the camera arrived in the mail. Unfortunately, it was not what I expected. The touch screen was somewhat unresponsive or, on the opposite end of the spectrum, too responsive and would take pictures when I didn't want it to or would go all over the place. However, I will say that the rest of the features that this camera provided were great. Taking a picture (minus the touch screen) was a breeze and the pictures were always vivid and always captured what I wanted it to. However, after about 3-4 days of trying the camera out, I decided I needed to return the camera to Amazon so I could get a better one and I did. I got the Canon Powershot A2200 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Black) and it was a better value. It has many of the same features as the camera being reviewed does and some extras while also being less expensive. If you're looking for a good quality camera where you get more bang for your buck then that's the camera I would suggest.

Reviews.Title: Nikon vs. Canon - and the winner is...
Reviews.Author: Amy Weierman
Reviews.Content: I have a 5MP Canon Elph (which I've never had a problem with since purchase) that I bought six years ago came with an AC plug-into-the-wall charger for the battery that came with the camera.  This is great for charging extra batteries and doesn't require any additional ridiculous cord.  This Nikon comes with a plug and USB cord that plugs in to the camera to charge the battery.  Inconvenient. This is, however, a great way for Nikon to make extra money on accessories. In addition, as far as I can tell, the USB cord that comes with the Coolpix camera is a proprietary type, not a standard mini- or micro-USB, so you HAVE to have the Nikon cord to charge and sync your pics (if you don't have a card reader), so if you want a spare, be prepared to spend more money here too.  Right now, the battery is still charging, which according to specs, can take 4-6 hours.  So a spare battery that I can charge outside the camera sure would be handy to have...  I'll be sure to purchase off-brand so that Nikon isn't profiting from their tired old marketing scheme.  I'm old and I don't like change but I thought I'd try Nikon again, my first camera was an N2000 which I loved.UPDATE July 24, 2011:  I got this as a gift for a picky family member with arthritis so unboxed it and tried it out a bit. I don't like the touchscreen menus and HATE the touch scrolling to view photos!  In theory, to delete one photo takes four taps, but on a touchscreen that isn't sensitive enough, you may have to tap six or eight times.  I find the photos on the viewfinder look red, but once downloaded the color is fine, and it really does take very nice photos.  The video is OK, but if you're looking for great quality HD video, this is only 720p - I'd suggest finding a 1080p device.  I just don't enjoy using this camera.  Overall, I find I'm taking less photos because I reach for the camera less often, and that that's no good.UPDATE August 14, 2011:  I was taking photos at the birthday party today and after about 20 photos, I suddenly got a "This card cannot be read" error on the screen!  Changed out the Transcend Class 10 SDHC 8GB card for the spare I carry, same error.  That ended my photo-taking for the day.  I got home, was thankfully able to load the photos I took onto my laptop, then formatted the cards.  Still no joy.  So I checked the user manual, which tells me that the four 'tested and approved' brands of SD cards are Sandisk, Toshiba, Lexar and Panasonic.  I happen to have a Sandisk SD card for my Canon EOS Rebel XSi (which I've never had a problem with in 3 years).  The card worked fine in the Nikon.  I checked the two Transcend cards in the Canon and they work just dandy.  Verdict:  Canon wins, I'm taking the Nikon back and getting a new Elph!  I wouldn't inflict this type of frustration on an enemy (but maybe an unruly family member...).UPDATE September 29, 2011: We exchanged the Nikon for a Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH24.  The store did not have any Canon Powershot Elph cameras (that's WorstBuy for you!  Much happier, great photos too!  Someday, I'll get a new Canon...

Reviews.Title: Balky Touch Screen
Reviews.Author: John Campbell
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this camera except the touch screen. Sometimes you have to do repeated touches or swipes to get the desired response.This is especially a problem when swiping through pictures as you view them. Sometimes it won't advance to the next picture even after several finger swipes - other times it will skip several pictures at once which is really really annoying because then you have to figure out where you were before - and do that without skipping too far in the other direction. I wish I had not bought this camera. I never owned a Nikon before, they have a good reputation so I thought I would try one. I may never get another.

Reviews.Title: Rip-off
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this camera.  It will not hold a charge.  Something is majorly wrong with the camera or battery.  This is my second Coolpix.  The first one was great.  Nikon is selling a lemon with this model.

Reviews.Title: Photos turn out great. Video need improvement.
Reviews.Author: 5frank5
Reviews.Content: This camera is meant for a person like me who just wants to take good photos without pushing a billion complicated buttons to get what I want. The autofocus is great, not a problem with that. The pictures it takes don't show up good on the 3 inch lcd but when the picture is taken oh my gaaa its great, it looks even better on the computer screen. What i mean by video needs improvement is the zooming part not only does it need an autofocus button but when i zoom in i feel i might throw up and watching the videos also make me want to barf. WE can also hear the camera zooming in which is bad, every time i zoom i it whirrres not loudly but very noticeable in the videos.I'm not going to bother going through other features if any because I dont use anything else.

Reviews.Title: Know nothing about cameras
Reviews.Author: Ray "Ray"
Reviews.Content: Starting from the moment of purchase, Amazon as always was very prompt and the specs were very insightful.  As for the camera itself, the casing feels kind of cheap.  Not as sturdy as my old Canon Digital Elph 300.  But after taking it on vacation and using it, the pictures were amazing.  The touch screen was very easy to use and I didn't even bother reading the directions. I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it !
Reviews.Author: Yeaz
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace a somewhat complicated Nikon L110, wife finds this to be much more user friendly. Should include a custom case for the price. Amazon price was the best overall.

Reviews.Title: Older s6000 is better, Touch screen is awful
Reviews.Author: donny "don130"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on my great experience with the s6000. I was very disappointed and am sending it back. It might be a defective one, but the touch screen is awful Barely responsive. The older model does not have the touch screen and is much easier to use. If I hated it I know my grandmother, who this camera was for, will throw it out the window.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Blackhorse
Reviews.Content: Some reviewers had trouble with focusing and others didn't.  I thought those that did might have caused their own problem.  They didn't.  This thing would not focus properly.  Some people didn't mention a focus problem and loved this camera.  That would seem to indicate that Nikon has a big quality control issue.  Some focus, some don't and they can't pull the problem ones before shipping them to the consumers.  Buy one if you like to gamble.  You may be lucky and get a good one.  I didn't so it was returned to Amazon and I bought a Canon ELPH 300 HS to replace it.  It was perfect right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Design Obsolescense
Reviews.Author: Jordan L. Gough
Reviews.Content: Bought from Amazon.com LLC / camera stopped responding to charger after a couple of months. Expect to pay the cost of camera for 'repair' if item is 'faulty'. I am getting really sick of crappy digital cameras that don't last.

Reviews.Title: newest nikon
Reviews.Author: Patricia Williamson
Reviews.Content: this is a wonderful small digital; my first!!! Lotta stuff to learn, tho'but i love the touch screen

Reviews.Title: not a good one
Reviews.Author: md
Reviews.Content: having a touch screen is an advantage, but if it works properly! For this camera you need so much pressure on the screen. Also, you need to charge the battery everyday (Maybe I'm using the camera too much).

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: BrVR
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera. Came with no scratches or dents. Perfect condition. It arived very early, the minimum date written. I am very happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !!
Reviews.Author: DSH
Reviews.Content: Bought this to use for our board meetings.  Wonderful little digital camera!Our Admin staff are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera
Reviews.Author: Lloyd Romie
Reviews.Content: Brought this as a small camera to take when my bigger P90 wasn't needed. Great camera with most of the same features as my p90. Great zoom, mode shotting, touch screen needed some getting used to, but works great. Still learning what else it can do. Would recomend to anyone looking for a easy small camera with lots of features at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Jesslee
Reviews.Content: Camera takes amazing pictures! The wide lens opens up so many more possibilities! Great product!Long lasting battery life. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Shame on you Adorama Camera
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I rated my product a 1 star toward the seller, Adorama Camera. The camera itself is a 4/5 (IMO).First, The Camera box was covered in a plastic bag with Adorama written all over it. When I received the camera, the box was extremely pretty banged up (it was even punctured). Sure, you could blame the carrier (UPS) for the damage, but I blame Adorama. They could have at least boxed it up to protect it. It IS an electronic after all. Would you want to buy a camera if you saw the box that holds the camera was bent, punctured, or smashed? No. Therefore, I am extremely disappointed on how horrible my product was packaged. Second, The box was opened. When i took the camera out, there was a big fat finger print smudged on the screen. I believe this product is labeled "New". It's not new when I get sent an open boxed item. To back up my belief that it's an opened box is because the wrist strap is missing.Now, about the Camera.The material feels pretty weak, I wouldn't be surprised if it breaks if I accidentally sit on it while it's in my back pocket. The touch screen is pretty responsive. It's pressure sensitive, so you do have to press on it, and not just touch it like how the ipod touches are. Think of a Nintendo DS or the old palm phones. That's why it comes with a stylus that attaches to the wrist strap (If only I received one).The Vibration reduction works pretty well, I tried to purposely blur the picture, and it comes out pretty clear. Though, the more you zoom in, the easier it is for the picture to blur, which is normal. Speaking of zoom, you do end up losing a lot of quality when you zoom all the way. The video camera does produce noise in low light situations like indoor house lighting, but it's not terrible. Has a pretty strong flash, it doesn't wash out the pictures at all.Over all, It's a solid camera for the price. If you're on a budget, this Camera is perfect, but you could get MUCH better ones that are about $20 more.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!! Great for beginning photographers!
Reviews.Author: Valerie Drum
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so that I could take good-quality pictures, and be able to edit them.And that's exactly what I got. The picture quality is outstanding, and there is a lot of fun editing choices. Its beautiful, modern, small, and very portable. I don't see how anyone could not like this. It is perfect for people that are just beginning photography, but aren't professional. I definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: stilegal "stilegal"
Reviews.Content: I'm a fine artist and needed a basic, high-res shootin' camera to archive my work and also to be able to shoot expertly capturing my images to be used as digital prints. The only thing I have against this camera is IT SHOOTS TOO CLEARLY! And I find myself fixing all MY painting imperfections in Photoshop. :D I can take my original images and enlarge them to an incredible size. What a camera! Highly recommend this little gem.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful camera, FAST shipping
Reviews.Author: The Deal
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera about a week before Christmas and it came with time to spare!  Package was in perfect condition, camera is AWESOME! Mom loves it :)

Reviews.Title: great and focuses well
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: this camera is a great comapact camera cause of the way it focuses, it is straight foward focusing on people and the touch screen is actually pretty good as well. one thing is (but this is with all compact cameras) when i was trying to take a pic of my new flat screen it wouldn't focus at all, blurry

Reviews.Title: Great Deal on a Great Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Cutter "Jim"
Reviews.Content: Camera was great as expected and the service was even better.  Camera arrived much earlier than promised.  Glad I went to Amazon to buy it.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Gregory Wentz
Reviews.Content: Amazing little camera colors are very warm have several point and shoots best of bunch by far in terms of functionality Only con is bit of alearning curve for touch sceen Buy and enjoy

Reviews.Title: Cool pics from coolpix
Reviews.Author: Ahmed R.
Reviews.Content: No doubt, this camera came in a cheap price but with lots of features.Thanks to touch-Panel LCD. Bright LCD, 7X zoom and well-built design. It is one of the best 16mp compact cameras for the price.  wish it had a built-in GPS to help with my worldwide traveling.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX S6100
Reviews.Author: Nancy M. De Umerez "NANCY"
Reviews.Content: A VERY NICE CAMERA WITH A GOOD PRICE. I EVER LIKE NIKON PRODUCTS. FOR A LONG TIME I HAVE BEEN UPDATING MY NIKON CAMERAS ONE TIME EVERY TWO YEARS

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: gooselw
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera to take pictures for a new website. The quality of the pictures are fantastic. As of this date the camera has performed flawlessly. I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Horrible zoom, couldn't focus, freezes up, BAD camera
Reviews.Author: Nevermore20
Reviews.Content: I'm not a professional photographer, just someone who wants a camera that works great out of the box without a lot of tweaking necessary...just a point and shoot camera.  This camera failed miserably.  I've never had a camera actually "freeze" and refuse to turn on after turning it off.  It happened 5 times in one day with this camera. I actually had to pull the battery, remove it, and put it back in to get the camera to work again.  The camera took decent pictures if you didn't zoom in at all.  Any zoom, and I mean ANY zoom, would make the camera unable to focus.  I have never experienced this in a camera before, even in much cheaper models.  Once zoomed in this camera refused to focus, resulting in many, many, blurry pictures.  I was extremely disappointed in this camera. Who knows, maybe there's some deep down feature buried in menus that would have alleviated my problem, but in my opinion any camera should be able to perform basic features out of the box...like focus and take a picture. As a side note, I now have a Canon PowerShot comparable in price to this Nikon.  The Canon not only out performed this Nikon but exceeded my expectations for a camera in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: stp
Reviews.Content: Touch screen functionality isn't ready for production. Nikon should consider finishing product development prior to market entry in order to avoid losing client base. If you want this type of functionality wait until Apple makes a camera or Nikon steals someone elses technology. Currently they are not producing a consumer ready product.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: dawn rubin
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it, after adjusting it to her liking. She likes the lens capabilities. The camera is easy to use. For the price, it is a good value.

Reviews.Title: Bad Camera
Reviews.Author: Tabitha Peronto
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it would at least be better than my 5 year old kodak.  It wasn't.  This camera never focuses on what I want, even when I do touch focus, and when I finally take a picture it comes out blurry.  When I zoom no matter how close or far it will end up blurry.  I have tried all sorts of settings on this camera, but none work.  If I try to take any picture everything ends up orange.  All these problems and it takes too long to take the picture.  With all the good reviews I must have gotten a bad one, but now I can't even return it.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Camera
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Bought a Coolpix S6100 based on Nikon's great reputation.  Took the new camera on a vaction to Europe and on the very first day of use the lens cover broke.  It will not fully close when I turn the camera off and will not fully open when I turn the camera on. I have to manually push the cover off the lens in order to take pictures.  It is very diappointing performance from Nikon.  I will be sending to to their customer service at my expense for them to evalutate.  Hopefully they will fix or replace. Until then I would guide people away from this camera.

Reviews.Title: John's world
Reviews.Author: John1939
Reviews.Content: Camera was given as gift to granddaughter.  She is very pleased with the camera. Price was competetive with local purchase but it was delivered to door. Did not have to go shopping

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: HappySlap
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a replacement for a Nikon 550. I have only taken about 30 photos with the camera and for the most part they came out fine. Unfortunately, I am now unable to charge or power on the camera.
